channel.title: India on Новости электронного книгоиздания
channel.description: Recent content in India on Новости электронного книгоиздания

item.title: Подписочный сервис Amazon открылся в Индии
item.description: Today, the American company launched Kindle Unlimited in India, a subscription service that allows its users to pick and read as much as they want from over a million books at a monthly fee of INR 199 (US$3). Early birds get it half price. Source: Amazon throws open a million books for Indians on Kindle at $3 a month Три бакса в месяц? Прям как Bookmate — по нынешнему курсу.
